title: Wraith-world (2R86)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Spot a twilight Nazgul and the Ring-bearer wearing The One Ring to add 3 burdens.
Lore:	”'He is passing into the shadow world, he will soon become a wraith like them.'”
Rarity:	R
